call_recording_caller_phone_numbers.description: When call_recording_type is 'by_caller_phone_number', only outbound calls using one of these numbers will be recorded. Numbers must be specified in E164 format.

call_recording_channels.description: When using 'dual' channels, the final audio file will be a stereo recording with the first leg on channel A, and the rest on channel B.

call_recording_format.description: The audio file format for calls being recorded.
